title: 领地插件设置了最大边长但是圈地时还是说超过最大范围
author: _CrazyNut_
txt_content: 新人没什么金克拉 。。求大大说一下。。

replies.author: xkw794154235
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: _CrazyNut_
replies.txt_content:
# The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 3
           # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have.
           MaxAreasPerResidence: 2
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 256
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 256
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 256
           # The lowest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MinHeight: 0
           # The highest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MaxHeight: 255
这样设置的可以么。

replies.txt_content:

           MaxResidences: 3
           # The m ...
可以的说

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content: 如果是管理员圈地的话，输入/resadmin create xxx即可创建领地，不受大小限制。

replies.author: 满眼灬的泪
replies.txt_content:
l736190890 发表于 2014-7-8 17:05
# The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 3
           # The m ...
MaxEastWest后面数值改为999
MaxNorthSouth后面的数值改为999
这样基本可以无限了= =因为特么谁会建个超过999*999的领地{:10_492:}

replies.author: 父
replies.txt_content:
/resadmin create 领地名
管理员指令，无视范围限制
